pageDescription: Discover the five unique Ikigai personality types and how each finds their life's purpose
heroSubtitle: Each person finds their purpose in a unique way

builder.name: The Builder
builder.title: The Builder - Ikigai Personality Type
builder.description: Builders find purpose in creating tangible systems and lasting structures
builder.coreDescription: You feel most fulfilled when building something meaningful—whether that's a system, a business, a family, or a legacy. Your Ikigai comes from steady progress toward long-term vision.
builder.purposeSourceDescription: Your Ikigai flows from creating lasting impact through systematic, thoughtful construction of something meaningful.
challengesList: May feel frustrated with abstract concepts
Can be overly focused on details
builder.nurturing: How to Nurture Your Builder Type
nurturingTips: Develop systems and processes others can use
Find ways to build something lasting
journalingPrompts: What systems or structures have you built that you're proud of?
How can you use your organizational skills to help others?
What tangible project would you like to create?
builder.ctaDescription: Take our comprehensive Ikigai test to discover your unique path to purpose and fulfillment.

explorer.name: The Explorer
explorer.title: The Explorer - Ikigai Personality Type
explorer.description: Explorers find purpose in discovering new ideas, places, and possibilities
explorer.coreDescription: Your Ikigai lives in exploration—whether that's new places, new ideas, or new parts of yourself. You thrive when you're expanding your world and learning from experience.
explorer.purposeSourceDescription: Your Ikigai flows from the joy of discovery and the continuous expansion of your understanding and experience.
strengths: Natural curiosity and love of learning
challengesList: Tendency to start many projects without finishing
Can feel restless in traditional environments
explorer.nurturing: How to Nurture Your Explorer Type
nurturingTips: Seek variety in your work and personal life
Find ways to share your discoveries
journalingPrompts: What new ideas or experiences have excited you recently?
How can you incorporate more exploration into your daily life?
What would you like to discover or learn next?
explorer.ctaDescription: Take our comprehensive Ikigai test to discover your unique path to purpose and fulfillment.

dreamer.name: The Dreamer
dreamer.title: The Dreamer - Ikigai Personality Type
dreamer.description: Dreamers find purpose in envisioning and inspiring positive futures
dreamer.coreDescription: You are a visionary, full of imagination, depth, and untapped ideas. You feel most alive when you're creating something new or inspiring others with your unique perspective.
dreamer.purposeSourceDescription: Your Ikigai flows from your ability to envision possibilities that don't yet exist and inspire others to believe in those possibilities.
strengths: Ability to inspire and motivate others
challengesList: Can become frustrated with real-world limitations
dreamer.nurturing: How to Nurture Your Dreamer Type
nurturingTips: Find ways to express your creativity
Connect with others who share your vision
Develop practical skills to realize your dreams
journalingPrompts: What vision of the future inspires you most?
How can you use your imagination to help others?
What dream would you like to turn into reality?
dreamer.ctaDescription: Take our comprehensive Ikigai test to discover your unique path to purpose and fulfillment.

achiever.name: The Achiever
achiever.title: The Achiever - Ikigai Personality Type
achiever.description: Achievers find purpose in reaching goals and overcoming challenges
achiever.coreDescription: You are driven by accomplishment and the satisfaction of reaching your goals. Your Ikigai comes from pushing boundaries and achieving what others might consider impossible.
achiever.purposeSourceDescription: Your Ikigai flows from the pursuit of excellence and the satisfaction of overcoming challenges that matter to you.
challengesList: May be overly focused on outcomes
Can struggle to relax and enjoy the journey
achiever.nurturing: How to Nurture Your Achiever Type
nurturingTips: Find ways to compete that benefit others
journalingPrompts: What achievements have given you the most satisfaction?
How can you use your determination to create positive impact?
What challenge would you like to overcome next?
achiever.ctaDescription: Take our comprehensive Ikigai test to discover your unique path to purpose and fulfillment.

helper.name: The Helper
helper.title: The Helper - Ikigai Personality Type
helper.description: Helpers find purpose in supporting and uplifting others
helper.coreDescription: You are naturally drawn to helping others and making a positive difference in their lives. Your Ikigai comes from the deep satisfaction of knowing you've contributed to someone else's wellbeing.
helper.purposeSourceDescription: Your Ikigai flows from the genuine care you feel for others and the joy you experience in making their lives better.
helper.nurturing: How to Nurture Your Helper Type
nurturingTips: Find ways to help that also nourish you
Seek opportunities to support causes you care about
journalingPrompts: When have you felt most fulfilled helping others?
How can you balance helping others with caring for yourself?
What positive impact do you want to have on others' lives?
helper.ctaDescription: Take our comprehensive Ikigai test to discover your unique path to purpose and fulfillment.

callToAction.title: Discover Your Ikigai Type
callToAction.description: Take our comprehensive test to discover which of these types resonates most with you

mainPageTitle: Ikigai Personality Types - Complete Guide to 4 Main Types
mainPageDescription: Discover the 4 main Ikigai personality types and their characteristics. Learn how each type approaches passion, mission, vocation, and profession differently.
mainHeroSubtitle: Discover the four primary Ikigai personality types and understand how your dominant area shapes your path to purpose and fulfillment.
understandingDescription: While everyone has elements of all four areas, your dominant area reveals your primary source of motivation and fulfillment.
detailedBreakdownDescription: Each Ikigai personality type has unique characteristics, strengths, and challenges. Understand how these types manifest in real life.

creativeEnthusiast.name: Creative Enthusiast
creativeEnthusiast.description: Driven by passion and creativity, you thrive in environments that allow artistic expression and innovation.
developmentTips: Learn to receive and act on feedback

skilledPractitioner.name: Skilled Practitioner
skilledPractitioner.description: You excel through mastery and expertise, finding fulfillment in developing and applying specialized skills.

purposeDrivenHelper.name: Purpose-Driven Helper
purposeDrivenHelper.description: You find meaning in helping others and contributing to causes larger than yourself.
developmentTips: Learn to measure and communicate impact

strategicAchiever.name: Strategic Achiever
strategicAchiever.description: You find purpose in building successful ventures and creating economic value through strategic thinking.

mixedTypes.title: Understanding Mixed Types
mixedTypes.description: Many people have balanced scores across multiple areas. This creates unique hybrid types with their own strengths and opportunities.

creativeExpert.name: Creative Expert
creativeExpert.description: High in both passion and vocation, these individuals excel in creative fields that require technical skill.

socialEntrepreneur.name: Social Entrepreneur
socialEntrepreneur.description: Combining mission and profession, they create purpose-driven businesses with social impact.

artisticHelper.name: Artistic Helper
artisticHelper.description: United by passion and mission, they use creativity to make a positive difference.

strategicSpecialist.name: Strategic Specialist
strategicSpecialist.description: Strong in vocation and profession, they master technical skills with business acumen.

balancedVisionary.name: Balanced Visionary
balancedVisionary.description: With high scores across all areas, they have potential for transformational leadership.

emergingPurpose.name: Emerging Purpose
emergingPurpose.description: Moderate scores suggest a developing ikigai with many possibilities ahead.

callToAction.title: Discover Your Ikigai Type
callToAction.description: Take our comprehensive test to discover which type resonates most with you
